name: Kidney Bean, Red Onion And Tomato Salad
keywords: cherry tomatoes, red kidney beans, red onion, raw, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon fine sea salt, more as needed
3 14-ounce cans red kidney beans, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine onions and vinegar. Set aside to macerate while preparing rest of salad, or up to three hours.
Halve cherry tomatoes and place in a serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt. Add kidney beans, onion mixture and olive oil. Toss gently to mix, adjust salt to taste, and serve.
